description:
An adversary might use WMI to check if a certain Remote Service is running on a remote device.
When the test completes, a service information will be displayed on the screen if it exists.
A common feedback message is that "No instance(s) Available" if the service queried is not running.
A common error message is "Node - (provided IP or default) ERROR Description =The RPC server is unavailable" if the provided remote host is unreacheable
 Author: frack113. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: WMI Reconnaissance List Remote Services
